localized title: Mooru Guttu Ondu Sullu Ondu Nija
plot outline: This is a low budget comedy movie with the overall movie being shot in a single house. The movie starts with the family having four children with Komal as the eldest son and three girls. The overall movie is a drama taking place in a house in one day. The parents are scheduled to a one-day trip to Tirupati. The children, knowing about it, the elder three children inform their lovers to come to their home.[citation needed] But the comedy starts when their aunt comes to sleep in their home. The lovers are supposed to hide in their rooms so that they don't get seen by other siblings and the aunt. After some time the appu (Ramesh Aravind) arrives with some relational links and sleeps in their home. He visits each of the children's rooms and the interesting thing is to watch how each of them hide their lovers in their home. Finally, next day when the parents arrive, various truths are brought in front of them with some feelings.
title: Mooru Guttu Ondu Sullu Ondu Nija
akas: Mooru Guttu Ondu Sullu Ondu Nija (India)
plot: This is a low budget comedy movie with the overall movie being shot in a single house. The movie starts with the family having four children with Komal as the eldest son and three girls. The overall movie is a drama taking place in a house in one day. The parents are scheduled to a one-day trip to Tirupati. The children, knowing about it, the elder three children inform their lovers to come to their home.[citation needed] But the comedy starts when their aunt comes to sleep in their home. The lovers are supposed to hide in their rooms so that they don't get seen by other siblings and the aunt. After some time the appu (Ramesh Aravind) arrives with some relational links and sleeps in their home. He visits each of the children's rooms and the interesting thing is to watch how each of them hide their lovers in their home. Finally, next day when the parents arrive, various truths are brought in front of them with some feelings.
